text: Hagi ana kema hia kemofo nona'a, kini ne'mofo eri'za vahepinti mago eri'za ne'amo'a anage huno asmi'ne, 5fu'a hosi afutaminke mani'nazanki zamatrege'za eri'za vu'za Siria vahetera naza fore hu'nefi ome keho. Hanki Siria vahe'mo'zama ana vahe'ma zamahe frisazana, e'i knare hugahie. Na'ankure tagrama ama rankumapima mani'nona vahe'motanena, anazanke huta frigahune.
